冬牡丹: (ふゆぼたん) - Paeonia suffrutticosa; tree peony
冬瓜: (とうが) - wax gourd (Benincasa hispida); ash gourd; white gourd; winter melon
冬瓜子: (とうがし) - wax gourd seed; winter melon seed
冬篭り: (ふゆごもり) - hibernation; staying indoors during winter
冬籠り: (ふゆごもり) - hibernation; staying indoors during winter
冬至カボチャ: (とうじカボチャ) - custom of keeping a pumpkin or squash during the winter and eating it on the day of the winter solstice
冬至南瓜: (とうじかぼちゃ) - custom of keeping a pumpkin or squash during the winter and eating it on the day of the winter solstice
冬至粥: (とうじがゆ) - azuki bean rice gruel eaten on the day of the winter solstice (to chase away demons that spread contagious diseases)
冬至線: (とうじせん) - the Tropic of Capricorn
冬芝: (ふゆしば) - lawn grass for cold areas
冬苺: (フユイチゴ) - Rubus buergeri (species of raspberry)
冬菊: (ふゆぎく) - winter chrysanthemum (Chrysanthemum indicum) (hardy chrysanth variety)
冬菜: (ふゆな) - winter vegetables/winter greens; tang cai
冬葱: (ふゆき) - Welsh onion (Allium fistulosum); Japanese bunching onion
冬薯蕷葛: (ところずら) - Dioscorea tokoro (species of wild yam)
冬虫夏草: (トウチュウカソウ) - caterpillar fungus (esp. Cordyceps sinensis)
冬越し: (ふゆごし) - wintering; passing the winter
冬隣: (ふゆどなり) - late autumn that makes it seem like winter is coming
冬霧: (ふゆぎり) - winter fog; fog during winter
冬頭: (ふゆがしら) - kanji "winter" radical at top (radical 34)
冱えない: (さえない) - dark/dull/sullen; unsatisfactory/dissatisfying; unattractive/unappealing; boring/uninteresting
冱える: (さえる) - to be clear (of a sight, sound, colour, etc.)/to be bright/to be vivid/to be crisp; to be clear-headed/to be alert/to be on the ball/to be wide awake; (often as 冴えない) to look upbeat/to be perky/to be cheerful; to master (a skill)/to excel at/to cleanly execute; (often as 冴えない)  to be satisfying; (original meaning; now somewhat old-fashioned) to become frigid/to become intensely cold
冲する: (ちゅうする) - to rise up into the air; to ascend into the sky
冴えた夜: (さえたよる) - crisp and cold night
冴えた色: (さえたいろ) - bright color; bright colour
冴えない: (さえない) - dark/dull/sullen; unsatisfactory/dissatisfying; unattractive/unappealing; boring/uninteresting
冴える: (さえる) - to be clear (of a sight, sound, colour, etc.)/to be bright/to be vivid/to be crisp; to be clear-headed/to be alert/to be on the ball/to be wide awake; (often as 冴えない) to look upbeat/to be perky/to be cheerful; to master (a skill)/to excel at/to cleanly execute; (often as 冴えない)  to be satisfying; (original meaning; now somewhat old-fashioned) to become frigid/to become intensely cold
冴え冴えした顔: (さえざえしたかお) - cheerful look; fresh complexion
冴え冴えとした顔: (さえざえとしたかお) - cheerful look; fresh complexion
冴え渡る: (さえわたる) - to get cold; to freeze over
冴え行く: (さえゆく) - to clear gradually; to get cold gradually
冴え輝く: (さえかがやく) - to shine clearly
冴え返る: (さえかえる) - to be very clear; to be keenly cold/to be cold and clear
冴返る: (さえかえる) - to be very clear; to be keenly cold/to be cold and clear
况や: (いわんや) - much more; not to mention; not to speak of; to say nothing of; let alone
冷える: (ひえる) - to grow cold (from room temperature, e.g. in refrigerator); to get chilly; to cool down
冷え上がる: (ひえあがる) - to get completely chilled
冷え入る: (ひえいる) - to become completely chilled
冷え冷え: (ひえびえ) - feeling chilly; being fearful; cold
冷え切る: (ひえきる) - to become completely chilled
冷え募る: (ひえつのる) - to get colder; to get chilled
冷え物: (ひえもの) - something cold (esp. a body); something used to cool one's stomach
冷え者: (ひえもの) - something cold (esp. a body); something used to cool one's stomach
冷え腹: (ひえばら) - abdominal chills; diarrhea; diarrhoea
冷え込み: (ひえこみ) - turning into a cooler state; cooling down
冷え込む: (ひえこむ) - to get colder; to get chilled
冷かす: (ひやかす) - to banter/to make fun of/to jeer at; to cool/to refrigerate; to window-shop/to look at without buying
冷し中華: (ひやしちゅうか) - chilled Chinese noodles
冷す: (ひやす) - to cool (from room temperature)/to chill/to refrigerate; to calm down/to cool off/to regain one's composure/to relax; to be frightened (at)/to be scared (of)
冷たい: (tsumetai) - cold (ao toque), chilly, icy, freezing; coldhearted, unfeeling, indifferent, unfriendly
冷たい戦争: (つめたいせんそう) - cold war
冷たい暗黒物質: (つめたいあんこくぶっしつ) - cold dark matter
冷ます: (さます) - to cool (e.g. from a high temperature to room temperature)/to let cool; to dampen/to throw a damper on/to spoil
冷めやらぬ: (さめやらぬ) - lingering (usu. feeling, emotion, etc.); continuing (to); still (...)
冷める: (さめる) - to become cool (e.g. from a high temperature to room temperature)/to come down (fever); to cool down (interest)/to abate/to subside/to dampen
冷め遣らぬ: (さめやらぬ) - lingering (usu. feeling, emotion, etc.); continuing (to); still (...)
冷や: (ひや) - cold water; cold sake; cold/cool/chilled/unheated
冷やかし: (ひやかし) - teasing/chaffing/raillery/ridicule/jeering; merely asking the price/just looking at goods/window-shopping/browsing
冷やかす: (ひやかす) - to banter/to make fun of/to jeer at; to cool/to refrigerate; to window-shop/to look at without buying
冷やし中華: (ひやしちゅうか) - chilled Chinese noodles
冷やし飴: (ひやしあめ) - chilled syrup; soft drink of malt syrup mixed with boiling water, ginger juice, grated ginger, sometimes sprinkled with cinnamon (used as a refreshing summer drink, similar to ginger ale)
冷やす: (ひやす) - to cool (from room temperature)/to chill/to refrigerate; to calm down/to cool off/to regain one's composure/to relax; to be frightened (at)/to be scared (of)
